title: So today i went to play ranked...
body:
And found myself with 2 apparently 1k+ points challenger smurfs in a low diamond game (around d4), i got secondary role (mid) and kind of fed/did bad and lost us the game, i was like the second loss on their like 35 game streak, guy added me after game to say hes surprised that i got past gold and trash talk a bunch and talk about the game and about how i was so bad that not even challengers could carry etc etc (apparently he got really pissed that i said he couldnt even carry a low diamond game), and thats with me on a huge losing streak in ranked already...

FeelsReallyBadMan, honestly that actually made me sad :( ... Like idk i dont even feel like playing this game anymore...
